title: El Paisano
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One of few places in Ba√±os that has a vegetarian menu. Pizzas, soups, veggie platters with steamed vegetables and rice, herbal teas, breakfasts, yogurt. The decor is an art gallery with items for sale, and newspapers and playing cards for use. Location is a 5-minute walk from town centre towards the thermal baths; previously at Rafael Viera y Martinez. NOTE: Starting Feb 29, 2013 the manager will stop selling food, and this establishment will be a gallery only.
streetAddress: Santa Clara y Luis A. Martinez
